  • Ubend
    • class Ubend

    Attributes

    int cursor protected
    position of the next block to fill
    int capacity protected
    maximum size of the container
    double last_erased_data protected
    last value erased (replaced by a new one)

    Methods

    Ubend(int N=-1) public
    Basic Ubend constructor.
    Ubend merge(const Ubend &U) const public
    Merge two Ubend instances (take half data in each instance)
    int getCursor() public
    Get the value of the cursor, so the next block to fill.
    double getLastErasedData() public
    Get the value of the last erased data.
    int getCapacity() public
    Get the capacity of the container (its max size)
    bool isFilled() public
    Get the fill state of the container.
    UBENDSTATUS push(double x) public
    Feed the container with a new value.
